attributes.action: Prevent voters from paying twice for refuse collection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already pay for the removal of refuse in our council tax. If the council take out, completely, that refuse tax, then pay as you throw, that would be fair. One thing for sure, there is too much of this "Double Stealth Taxation" of late and I am not paying twice for one service, that is illegal for a start, it has to be bordering on fraud!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
